charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute a quantity in excess of 100 grams of Heroin [21 USC 846, 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B)] (Offense Date: 12/27/94) Penalty: 5-40 yrs and/or $2 million fine plus $50 Spec. Assess and 4-5 yrs SRT. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Ct. 1: 5 yrs to serve with 4 yrs SRT. (1)
